title: Studio Unit in Nob Hill ,It's available on 9/10/2022
posting_body: One month's security deposit required to sign the lease, first month's rent required to move in
This special place was completely renovated and close to Chinatown, Union Square, Financial District, and Fisherman's Wharf.
There's a Bus stop and Cable Cars near the corner making it easy to plan your visit.
NOTE: Parking is difficult, no pets, no smoking
Muni #10 and #12 stop down the street.
10 minutes walking to Fidi and Union Square.
15 minutes walking to the Montgomery Bart station and SF Ferry Building.
If you're interested in the room, DM me for details.
